Text: What is this? The link is to The Biggest Loser and the summary sounds like American Idol. What show is this?

Here's the IMDB link for the show: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1666667/
 It just came out, it's with Life Coach Guru Anthony Robbins.
This is the real deal.  Ignore that it says "the biggest loser" in the description, it's the first episode of Tony Robbins' new show.

Thank you, this is great!
It's been a long time since I could enjoy an American reality show.
When comes the next episode?
